channel.title: I cant turn on my private server
channel.description:
:confused: my friend he gave me his private server and he gave me a program called no-ip. i do not know what its for. i guess it has nothing to do with this problem but anyways he gave me the files for the private server and i extracted them and i clicked the runner. but it says open on port 43594, so when i try to log in it says "error connecting to server". someone please help me with this problem
p.s. im using a wireless laptop with vista if that has anything to do with it

item.title: I cant turn on my private server
item.dc:creator: @Honor_Swords Honor Swords
item.description:
@Honor_Swords wrote:

download this to run your server https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewFilteredProducts-SingleVariationTypeFilter;pgid=yYdgaHqkkjVSR0EUPIQsoQ3D0000CZcijkka;sid=-qDy4lBn83zy4xgLH62657_CoHq2KZ0ir0I9I015fp1piA== then go into you my computer then go to view system information go to advanced click on envirom somthing go to bottom box click edit type this next to class CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%; and type this next to path and edit put C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin; since your friend gave it to you you cant run it off his ip becase that is his computer you need to run it off yous go to no-ip.com create an ip after u register an account then click host then click run on you server then go odd silab if you want or mopar i dont care lol

Read full topic

item.title: I cant turn on my private server
item.dc:creator: @big_fella big fella
item.description:
@big_fella wrote:

i have no clue wat a run.bat is and wat port forwarding is. if you could reply with more detail or help me out step by step would help alot

Read full topic
item.source: I cant turn on my private server

item.title: I cant turn on my private server
item.dc:creator: @A_L_I_V_E A L I V E
item.description:
@A_L_I_V_E wrote:

No-ip DUC is for creating the server address such as 123456.NO-IP.BIZ" <— NOT AN ACTUAL SERVER,ATLEAST NONE THAT I KNOW OF!

You have got to keep Run.bat open,try using the IP 127.0.0.1 and tell me if it works.You also may want to try port forwarding,do you connect to your own network or someone Else’s network.You can contact me if you need more help.

Read full topic
